NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: I'm thrilled to be able to help with testing your new projection stone today, Daz!
2
1
CASSAVA: To start: please let me know if you can read this message on the wall!
3
2
DAZ: I read you bright and clear, my love!
4
3
DAZ: Next, the moment of truth... Will the voyager be able to walk beyond the projection pool?
5
4
CASSAVA: Daz? Your voyager just disappeared.. Are you alright? Daz?
Workshop Locked EX3 2
